description: Pre-packaged plugin bundles for Cowork distribution. Each bundle combines multiple Claude Code plugins into a single Cowork-compatible plugin ZIP.

bundles.name: DevOps Powerhouse
bundles.description: Complete DevOps toolkit: AWS EKS deployments, Helm chart management, deployment pipelines, Keycloak auth, and team acceleration. Everything from infrastructure to delivery.
highlights: EKS cluster provisioning with Helm-based app deployment
State-machine deployment pipeline with rollback support
Team capacity planning and workflow automation

bundles.name: Full Stack Builder
bundles.description: End-to-end application development: FastAPI backends with MongoDB/Keycloak, React frontends with IaC, and universal project templating. Scaffold to production in one session.
highlights: FastAPI REST APIs with async endpoints, Beanie ODM, and Keycloak auth
React/Vite frontends with Ansible/Terraform infrastructure
Universal templating: Handlebars, Cookiecutter, Copier, Maven archetypes

bundles.name: Enterprise Workflow Engine
bundles.description: The 140-agent Jira orchestration powerhouse combined with team tooling and deployment pipelines. Sprint planning, code review, PR automation, and release management at enterprise scale.
highlights: 81 specialized Jira agents across 16 teams
Full sprint lifecycle: planning, standup, review, retro
One-command ship: /jira:ship analyzes, codes, tests, and opens PR

bundles.name: Creative Frontend Studio
bundles.description: 263+ design styles meet 11 animation skills. Build stunning, accessible frontends with design tokens, component libraries, white-labeling, Framer Motion, GSAP, Three.js, and Lottie.
highlights: 263+ curated design styles with multi-tenant theming
11 animation skills: Framer Motion, GSAP, Three.js, Lottie, CSS
Accessibility specialist agent for WCAG compliance
White-label specialist for multi-tenant portals

bundles.name: Smart Home Pro
bundles.description: Complete Home Assistant platform with 15 specialized agents: core architecture, automation building, Zigbee networking, energy monitoring, security hardening, Ollama LLM integration, and Ubuntu server deployment.
highlights: 15 specialist agents covering every HA domain
Zigbee/Z-Wave network management
Energy dashboard and solar optimization
Local LLM integration with Ollama

bundles.name: Nonprofit Command Center
bundles.description: AI-powered executive director suite with 11 automation agents for trade associations and nonprofits, plus Keycloak multi-tenant platform management. Grants, board governance, membership, and compliance.
highlights: 11 executive automation agents (grants, board, compliance, HR, finance)
6-factor automation scoring algorithm
Keycloak multi-tenant management
LangGraph workflow generation

bundles.name: Microsoft Enterprise Platform
bundles.description: 19-agent Microsoft ecosystem orchestrator: Azure, Dataverse, Fabric, Graph API, Power Automate, Planner, and Teams. Multi-entity multi-tenant deployment across the full Microsoft stack.
highlights: 19 specialized agents across identity, data, platform, and comms
Multi-entity multi-tenant deployment orchestration
MCP server for Graph API, Dataverse, Fabric, and Planner
HIPAA-compliant configuration guards

bundles.name: Plugin Marketplace Toolkit
bundles.description: Meta-tools for building and managing plugin marketplaces: trust scoring, composition engine, federated registry, developer studio with hot-reload, and supply chain security.
highlights: Intent-based composition engine for plugin orchestration
Supply chain security with cryptographic trust scoring
Federated registry protocol for cross-marketplace discovery
Developer studio with hot-reload for plugin authoring
